title: Mapping
questions: How can we view aligned sequences?
objectives: Understand the basic concept of mapping
See a genome browser used to better understand your aligned data
key_points: There are many mapping tools, best choice depends on your data
Choice of mapper can affect downstream results
Genome browsers can be used to view aligned reads
